name: Fight Fort Shooting Battle 3D
description:
Drop in from the helicopter, loot up and start fighting! This is a survival of the hero in Squad Fight Fort Battle 3d.

Modern Shooting Fight Squad is a first-person shooting game for mobile devices.
Join this first-person adventure now!

Play this shooting Squad Fight Fort Survival 3D for free choose the Hero with unique fighting skills. You have been deployed to battle against squad battle terrorists. Get ready for some action with your favourite guns and join this shooting 3d.Fight night Squad Battleground is a free battle game for mobile,

Survival on the unknown battlegrounds. Define your landing spot wisely and look for the ultimate battle loot to help you survive unknown lands, build fort with craft items and be the last man standing player. On the Fight , be wary of the ring and make sure you stay inside the ring in this free battle fire game. Loot and equip modern weapons like assault rifles, sub machine guns, pistols, hand guns, shot guns, grenades and much more.

Features of Squad Fight Fort Battle 3d :

•More than 10 modern guns like AK47, M4A1, AWP and so on.
•Realistic 3D graphics and cool animations.
•Thrilling action packed gameplay.
•Easy play and smooth control.
•High-Quality Graphics & sound effects
